channel.title: briefUpdatesHealthOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesHealthOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: A inmigrantes con problemas de salud se les podría negar la visa para entrar al país, por nueva directiva del gobierno de Trump
item.description: Los extranjeros que solicitan visas para vivir en Estados Unidos podrían ser rechazados si tienen ciertas afecciones médicas, como obesidad o diabetes...

item.title: The shutdown leaves telehealth for Medicare patients in limbo
item.description: Telehealth for Medicare started during the pandemic and became popular quickly. But the shutdown put an abrupt halt to payments for the service.

item.title: White House strikes deals for lower prices on obesity drugs
item.description: Medicare beneficiaries will soon be able to get obesity and Type 2 diabetes drugs for a $50 copay. But there are some limitations.

item.title: AI steps in to detect the world's deadliest infectious disease
item.description: There's a global shortage of radiologists. Now artificial intelligence is helping speed up the diagnosis of tuberculosis in hard-to-reach communities.
